header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 215-60r17 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
Check out the sale price on this tire
Consistently rated as excellent by 215-60r17 drivers

content.body:
### Shop 215/60R17 Tire Size The 215/60R17 tire size is one you’ll find on sedans, minivans and crossovers like the Dodge Grand Caravan, Mazda MPV, Nissan Juke ,Honda CR-V, Buick Encore and Audi Allroad. All-season tires are an excellent choice for vehicles like these, thanks to their balance of ride comfort, low highway noise, predictable handling and year-round traction, even in light snow. If you’re looking for a great set of premium all-season tires in the 215/60R17 size, we’d suggest tires like the Bridgestone Ecopia H/L 422 Plus, [Yokohama Geolandar CV G058](https://simpletire.com/brands/yokohama-tires/geolandar-cv-g058), Nokian One, or Falken Sincera SN250 A/S. Popular vehicles: 1987-2012 Dodge Grand Caravan
1999-2016 Mazda MPV
2019-2021 Nissan Juke
2001-2006 Honda CR-V
2013-2021 Buick Encore
2001-2005 Audi Allroad Crossovers are really popular as family haulers, and are loaded with amenities and comfort features for long road trips. If your minivan or crossover puts in lots of hours on the interstate, consider touring tires for their balance of long treadwear, ride comfort and low noise. Some of our favorite premium touring tires in the 215/60R17 size include the Continental CrossContact LX Sport, [General Altimax RT43](https://simpletire.com/brands/general-tires/altimax-rt43), Sumitomo Touring LX T/H/V, and Radar Dimax AS-8. Maybe your crossover is equipped with AWD, and maybe you live in a part of the country that often has snow on the ground and subfreezing temperatures for weeks at a time. If that’s the case, winter tires might be what you need to get the job done; they can deliver solid traction in snow and slush, better than all-season tires can. For dedicated winter tires in the 215/60R17 size, some of our recommendations would include the Bridgestone Blizzak WS90, [Pirelli Ice Zero FR](https://simpletire.com/brands/pirelli-tires/ice-zero-fr), Nokian Hakkapeliitta 9 SUV, and Hankook Winter i pike (W409). Just remember to change out your winter tires when temperatures are above about 40 degrees F, as their softer tread compound will wear quickly in warmer temps. Whether you drive a Buick Encore, Dodge Grand Caravan, Nissan Juke, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 215/60R17 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
